instructions.name: newDistributor
docs: After creating this [MerkleDistributor], the account should be seeded with tokens via its ATA.

instructions.name: setClawbackReceiver
docs: Sets new clawback receiver token account

instructions.name: clawback
docs: 1. Checking that the lockup has expired
2. Transferring remaining funds from the vault to the clawback receiver
3. Marking the distributor as clawed back
1. The distributor has not already been clawed back

accounts.name: tokenVault
docs: Distributor ATA containing the tokens to distribute.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Anyone can claw back the funds

accounts.name: tokenVault
docs: Distributor ATA containing the tokens to distribute.

accounts.name: MerkleDistributor
docs: State for the account which distributes tokens.

fields.name: base
docs: Base key used to generate the PDA.

fields.name: mint
docs: [Mint] of the token to be distributed.

fields.name: maxTotalClaim
docs: Maximum number of tokens that can ever be claimed from this [MerkleDistributor].

fields.name: maxNumNodes
docs: Maximum number of nodes that can ever be claimed from this [MerkleDistributor].

fields.name: totalAmountClaimed
docs: Total amount of tokens that have been claimed.

fields.name: numNodesClaimed
docs: Number of nodes that have been claimed.

fields.name: clawedBack
docs: Whether or not the distributor has been clawed back

accounts.name: ClaimStatus
docs: Holds whether or not a claimant has claimed tokens.
TODO: this is probably better stored as the node that was verified.

fields.name: isClaimed
docs: If true, the tokens have been claimed.

errors.name: ExceededMaxNumNodes
errors.msg: Exceeded maximum number of claimed nodes

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Account is not authorized to execute this instruction

errors.name: MintMismatch
errors.msg: Token mint did not match intended mint

errors.name: OwnerMismatch
errors.msg: Token account owner did not match intended owner

errors.name: PayerMismatch
errors.msg: Payer did not match intended payer

errors.name: InsufficientClawbackDelay
errors.msg: Clawback start must be at least one day after current time

errors.name: SameClawbackReceiver
errors.msg: New and old Clawback receivers are identical

errors.name: SameAdmin
errors.msg: New and old admin are identical
